contest-event.event-date:
March 16, 2014 D London and Southern Counties (Championship Section)
London and Southern Counties (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest London and Southern Counties Area london-and-southern-counties-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) None London and Southern Counties
Championship
St. Magnus
Arts & Leisure Centre (Gordon Craig Theatre), Stevenage, Hertfordshire, England, UK Best Cornet: Sara-Jane Humphrey, Wantage Best Horn: Nigel Stevens, Friary Guildford Best Euphonium: John Storey, Staines
Before the results a presentation was made to Dave Hobbs, retiring as secretary of the L&SC regional committee after many years service.
Sept. 9, 2010, 1:57 p.m. July 16, 2014, 12:51 p.m.
1 Wantage Silver Band Philip Bailey
2 Friary Brass Band Chris King
3 Redbridge Brass Alan Duguid
4 Zone One Brass Richard Ward
5 Kidlington Concert Brass Duncan Wilson
6 Staines Brass Jonathan Pippen
7 Aveley and Newham Band Melvin White
8 East London Brass Jayne Murrill
9 Medway Band Melvin White
